markdownRemark.html: This museum was the house of poet García Lorca and the place where he wrote some of his work. It is located in the Vega de Granada and was once owned by his family. Inside the house you can see personal objects of the poet including photos, paintings and manuscripts. In this house he wrote Bodas de Sangre.

frontmatter.title: Casa Museo Federico García Lorca de Granada
frontmatter.description: Casa Museo Federico García Lorca de Granada - This museum was the house of poet García Lorca and the place where he wrote some of his work. It is located in the Vega de Granada and was once owned by his family. Inside the house you can see personal objects of the poet including photos, paintings and manuscripts. In this house he wrote Bodas de Sangre.
frontmatter.price: Adults pay 3 euros. Children, pensioners and students pay 1 euro.
tags: Top things to do in Andalusia when it rains
